definition: old variant of 碰[peng4]
variant of 碰[peng4]
to touch/to meet with/to bump
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
surname Shi
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to come across/to run into/to meet/to hit
to collide/collision
to run into/to come upon/to meet
to meet/to run into (sb)/to get together (with sb)
by chance/by coincidence/to happen to
to run into/to meet (unexpectedly)/to bump into
to hit a wall/(fig.) to hit a brick wall/to hit a snag/to have the door slammed in one's face
to meet/to hold a meeting
to touch/(fig.) to touch on (a matter)
to meet force with force/painstaking

(coll.) to scam sb by setting up an "accident" in which one appears to have sustained damage or injury caused by the scam victim, then demanding compensation (variations include putting "expensive" porcelain in a place where it is likely to be knocked over by passers-by, and stepping into the path of a slow-moving car)
to try one's luck/to leave sth to chance
to knock against/to bump into/to have a disagreement/to clash

sentences.english: Please tell the boy not barge about the room.
sentences.chinese: 请叫那男孩别在房间里乱碰乱撞。

sentences.english: Please don't touch the furniture with sticky hands.
sentences.chinese: 请不要有黏乎乎的手碰家具。

sentences.english: I bent down and so did he, and we bashed heads.
sentences.chinese: 我弯下身子，他也一样，我们的头重重地碰在了一起。

sentences.english: " Big cocks and old hens walked over to spend, "touch Where's the matter?
sentences.chinese: 大公鸡和老花母鸡走过去，“碰哪儿啦？

sentences.english: But you might run into some jellyfish or Portuguese man-of-wars.
sentences.chinese: 但是你可能碰上海蛰或者僧帽水母。

sentences.english: My scar was still very tender.
sentences.chinese: 我的伤疤仍然是一碰就疼。

sentences.english: Touch his phone or computer and he flips out.
sentences.chinese: 碰他的电话或者电脑会让他发疯。

sentences.english: Sniffed it with pleasure then clinked his glass to hers.
sentences.chinese: 先高兴的闻了闻，再举起杯和玛丽莎碰了碰。

sentences.english: Sniffed it with pleasure then clinked his glass to hers.
sentences.chinese: 先高兴的闻了闻，再举起杯和玛丽莎碰了碰。

sentences.english: The money is handled by banks; staff do not touch it.
sentences.chinese: 这些钱有银行掌控员工不得碰它。

sentences.english: He hit his forehead against the kerb when he fell.
sentences.chinese: 他摔倒时额头碰在了路边镶边石上。

sentences.english: I should not have to rely on sustenance to the touch than the future.
sentences.chinese: 是我不应把依靠请托给触碰不到的将来。

sentences.english: His pockets clinked with many things That could make one a virgin again.
sentences.chinese: 他的口袋里碰有许多事情，这可能使一个处女再次。

sentences.english: I wish that I'd never touched that snakeskin , Jim.
sentences.chinese: 要是我没碰那张蛇皮该有多好，吉姆。

sentences.english: But how does the system know which icon, button or finger you tapped?
sentences.chinese: 但是这个系统怎么知道你触碰了哪个图标或者按钮呢？

sentences.english: The concept of failure in meditation is profoundly disempowering.
sentences.chinese: 在冥想中“失败”这个概念是万万不可去碰的。
